name: dns_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool whois_lookup_v3.
Tool description: This API pulls up-to-date records from the original data sources in real time, so you can have access to fresh data.
API description: This endpoint pulls DNS data from a domain

Parameters:
> domain - The domain to search
> rtype - The type of record to pull. Records availables: A, PTR, MX, CNAME, TXT,NS.

domain.description: The domain to search for DNS records.

rtype.description: The type of DNS record to fetch. Available records: A, PTR, MX, CNAME, TXT, NS.
